about_the_game:
More Spooky is a 5-Reel, 20-Payline aussie Style poker machine with editor and a horror theme.
Addon theme for More Panda - Stand alone game with editor.
Free Spins is awarded for 3 Scattered on any line and on all reels.
Wild Substitutes during normal play for all symbols except Red Devil , Dracula, Free Spins and Scatters and Bonus reels.
During Free Spins 2X multiplier pay double - X5 pays 5 times the amount and 2X + 5X on same line multiplies win x10.
2x and 5x substitute for all symbols except scattered, bonus and free spins.

World's first dual screen slot for the home market.
Now with autodetecting dual screen depicting game logo on second screen and big win animations.

Additional notes: Save games cannot be overwritten if game is loaded. Save games are made with extension *.msscv1
When saving even in stages always save as a new file otherwise the software will detect if you do and exit the game to prevent file been overwritten.
There will be many new games in this series, using the same engine, different themes and gameplay, save games will only work on this series.
Games available in this series:

More Panda - Slot Creator
More Spooky - Slot Creator
More Valentines - Slot Creator
More Farmland Fun - Slot Creator
More Gansters - Slot Creator
More Christmas - Slot Creator
More Greek Gyros - Slot Creator
More Fruity Fun - Slot Creator

Percentage payout similar to actual real play slots and wins are based on 1 cent gameplay.
All our games are for amusement only.

More Spooky is a 5-Reel, 20-Payline aussie Style poker machine with editor and a horror theme.
Addon theme for More Panda - Stand alone game with editor.
Free Spins is awarded for 3 Scattered on any line and on all reels.

2x and 5x substitute for all symbols except scattered, bonus and free spins.
